item.title: [LeetCode] 13. Roman to Integer
item.author: Debakar Roy
item.description: Roman to Integer Link to original Problem on LeetCode Roman numerals are represented by seven different symbols: I, V, X, L, C, D and M. Symbol Value I 1 V 5 X 10 L 50 C 100 D 500 M 1000 For example, two is written as II in Roman numeral, just two one’s added together. Twelve is written as, XII, which is simply X + II. The number twenty seven is written as XXVIIi, which is XX + V + II.
